to your collection, this is the example you need. With only 86,694 miles on the clock, this aggressive f-body has plenty of fight left in it. is an all inclusive collection of cars that began with American muscle and shifted focus to other highly desirable sports cars, imports, and exotics. This incredible collection is home to Ford, Dodge, and Chevrolet cars alongside some Ferraris, Porsches, Datsuns, Maseratis, and others.
